summary.summary_text: SPEAKER is at the conceptual design meeting for real reaction. There will be three presentations and a decision on the remote control concepts. Speaker will be at the share pool in the minute. He will be talking about components, user interface concepts, the touch screen and the energy. He is doing a lot.
